title: Still Not Wanting to Forget - Novel Updates
tags: Charming Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Lovers Reunited   Modern Day   Online Romance   Pets   Second Chance   Showbiz
author: Mo Bao Fei Bao   墨宝非宝
description: Still Not Wanting to Forget (念念不想忘) is a novella by Mo Bao Fei Bao (墨宝非宝) depicting the reunion of two former lovers who have never once met. Si Nian and Cheng Chen met in an online game and became each other’s first loves. Years later, they meet again as a famous director and a scriptwriter. A short and sweet story, also features equally adorable pair of pets.>
